channel.title: Xteleto and xteletome command
channel.description:
Hey guys, currently i have the normal xteletome and xteleto commands on my server, but instead of the player being just dragged to me, can they do this teleport thing?:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/xteleto.gif[/img]
how do i make it so that happens?

item.title: Xteleto and xteletome command
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

As somewhat stated above, it would be a mixture of setting animations, graphics and a delayed event for teleporting. Unless the server has some sort of action queuing system in which the teleporting can wait until the animations and graphics have resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Xteleto and xteletome command
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Make it so it sets a gfx Lots of methods for it:
stillgfx
setGFX
lowGFX
etc.

Read full topic
